scripts.refresh_all_projects: npm run refresh_projects_user && npm run refresh_projects_gjdt && npm run refresh_projects_tuc
scripts.refresh_projects_user: cross-env-shell "dotnet tool update -g GithubExplorer.CommandLine && github_explorer --target repositories --accessToken $GH_ACCESS_TOKEN --username KonH --output src/assets/repositories_user.json --filter "HtmlUrl;Name;Description;Language;Fork;StargazersCount;UpdatedAt;Archived;""
scripts.refresh_projects_gjdt: cross-env-shell "dotnet tool update -g GithubExplorer.CommandLine && github_explorer --target repositories --accessToken $GH_ACCESS_TOKEN --username Game-Jam-Dream-Team --output src/assets/repositories_gjdt.json --filter "HtmlUrl;Name;Description;Language;Fork;StargazersCount;UpdatedAt;Archived;""
scripts.refresh_projects_tuc: cross-env-shell "dotnet tool update -g GithubExplorer.CommandLine && github_explorer --target repositories --accessToken $GH_ACCESS_TOKEN --username TUC-Team --output src/assets/repositories_tuc.json --filter "HtmlUrl;Name;Description;Language;Fork;StargazersCount;UpdatedAt;Archived;""
scripts.refresh_pull_requests: cross-env-shell "dotnet tool update -g GithubExplorer.CommandLine && github_explorer -t pullrequests --accessToken $GH_ACCESS_TOKEN --username konh --output src/assets/pull_requests.json --filter "HtmlUrl;Title;CreatedAt;PullRequest.Merged;""
